title: Amazon Slips Below $1 Trillion in Value
itunes:title: Amazon Slips Below $1 Trillion in Value
description:
Bloomberg News Technology Reporter Matt Day discusses Amazon projecting the slowest holiday-quarter growth in the company’s history. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg Opinion Columnist Matt Levine provide some of the details of Matt's detailed deep dive in to in cryptocurrencies featured in the Businessweek Magazine cover story The Crypto Story. Neha Singh, CEO of Obsess, talks about creating metaverse experiences for brands. And we Drive to the Close with Chief Investment Officer at Hightower RDM Financial Group.
Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.  

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
